meanings.definition: The quality or state of being curved or having curves.
meanings.sent1: The curviness of the road made driving more interesting.
meanings.sent2: I admire the curviness of the river as it winds through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The curviness of the banana peel caused a comical slip.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had the graceful curviness of a flowing ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The curviness of the roller coaster track added thrill to the ride.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is curved or has curves.
meanings.sent1: The curviness of the path varied from gentle slopes to sharp turns.
meanings.sent2: She measured the curviness of the vase with a flexible ruler.
meanings.sent3: The curviness of the spaghetti strands made them tricky to twirl.
meanings.sent4: The curviness of the coastline resembled a tangled string on the map.
meanings.sent5: The curviness of the tree branches created intricate patterns against the sky.
